snippet: The Artissima art fair in Turin seeks to compete by emphasizing quality and internationality. But Italy’s export restrictions are a limiting factor....
lead_paragraph: The Artissima art fair in Turin seeks to compete by emphasizing quality and internationality. But Italy’s export restrictions are a limiting factor.

headline.main: In the Shadow of Art Basel and Frieze
headline.print_headline: In the shadow of Art Basel and Frieze
